title: Game Freezing Then Updates Randomly

embed.description: Bob Jane on Facebook, log in or create an account.

body:
So I was playing a game of ranked as Shaco, then in the middle of it (after the client crashing previously) the client freezes, and then starts to update randomly, forcing me to close league, and open it again. After doing this, it comes up with the terms of service, and has my region set to NA ([](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=1726794597639005&set=a.1726397221012076.1073741827.100009254457970&type=3&theater)even though I'm obviously OCE), and my username wasn't there either. I am now placed in lowest priority queue again, and after this lot, will have 40 games of lowest priority within the span of > a week. I have been having a lot of trouble with my client recently, and have been offered no support from the league community, or riot games themselves, so if you have any advice, I would be glad to hear it. Image of my client crashing is on my facebook page from when I was 11. Thank you everyone, and have a nice day / night.

~Thanks, Defusionist

replies.body:
Hey there,

That looks quite odd, and may indicate an issue with your GPU.

* Are your graphics drivers [up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq2)?
* Do you experience similar issues in any other games which may be more graphically intense than league of legends?

I tried everything on the link that pops up upon sending a bug splat report, and one of the suggestions was to update this, however this did not work and my client still continues to crash, and just recently I was placed into lowest priorit queue once again.

Also, a new problem has started to happen where I join a game and go into the loading screen (with all the champions, masteries, names, etc) then when all my friends join the game and buy there items, I have a pitch black screen with the LoL mouse there, and the only way to fix this is by shutting down my laptop. This has happened to me twice now and I don't know what the problem is. 
**The only game I have on my laptop is LoL**

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=1726794597639005&set=a.1726397221012076.1073741827.100009254457970&type=3&theater
This is what it looks like when I crash. The screen freezes with a bunch of yellow line / squares and half the screen goes black. Then the entire screen goes black and finally, it goes back to my desktop with the league of legends (in game) hand arrow still there, and I have to sign out then, back in for my laptop to work again.
